Below, you can upload your pdf file (workshop paper) and your data files archive. Please use as filename the first authors name plus algorithm name plus workshop paper IDs, where the algorithm was used (for example smith_PSO_ws1p04_ws1p05.pdf, smith_PSO_ws1p04_ws1p05.tar.gz). The filesize limit is 25MB. You cannot delete previous submissions but submit as many times as necessary (provided you changed the file names).

Please notify us at bbob@lri.fr For any questions or requests, please contact at the same address

Choose a file to upload:

For any questions or requests, please contact bbob@lri.fr
